model_answer:
The correct answer is B: [00:00:30 - 00:01:29]. 

In this segment, the screen displays the on-screen title "The Sun vs. A Black Hole" over close-up visuals of the Sun as the narrator compares the Sun to a black hole using the "apple versus a tiny, unimaginably heavy seed" analogy and mentions the Sun's enormous size (including fitting over a million Earths).

The relevant segment is between 00:05:04 - 00:06:15, as this is when the narrator discusses the counter-intuitive concept that the Earth would not be sucked into a sun-mass black hole due to gravitational pull.
